entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
